title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tool callers inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI—chat history, model switching, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting streaming, embeddings, model management and Kotlin coroutines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat sessions, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that wraps ollama-js for dependency-injected chat, embeddings and model services.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings and model management; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama, Open WebUI, Chroma, qDrant and PostgreSQL for local LLM playgrounds.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models with slash commands and conversation memory.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS and ollama-js to bring local LLMs into company channels.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, brainstorming and Q&A without leaving the vault.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s API with GenServer-backed clients and streaming support for Phoenix LiveView demos.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript tools provider that lets you call Ollama models as functions inside GPTScript workflows.
